name: anify-chouten
description: ``` ├── Home │   └── code.js ├── Info │   └── code.js ├── Media │   └── code.js ├── Search │   └── code.js ├── metadata.json └── icon.png ```

scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.json dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.png dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:ts
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:ts
scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint

author: Eltik
